snippet: ABRAMSON--Richard. The staff and trustees of Northwell Health (formerly North Shore-LIJ Health System) mourn the loss of Trustee Richard Abramson. A dedicated benefactor, co-chairman of the Investment Committee and a member of the Finance, Audit and Executive Committees, Richard and his wife Lorraine supported many programs at Long Island Jewish Medical Center. Thanks to the Abramsons' generosity and commitment to raising the standard of health care for our community, the Richard and Lorraine Abramson Clinical Center at the LIJ Hearing and Speech Center was established. Richard's friendship, philanthropic support and dedication helped Northwell Health become a regional and national leader in health care. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Lorraine; children Gregg Abramson and Jill Manczyk; and grandchildren Emma, Leah, Miles and Sadie. Mark L. Claster, Chairman, Board of Trustees, Northwell Health Michael J. Dowling, President and CEO, Northwell Health 1/3
